name: DynamicPickListRows

constructors.name: DynamicPickListRows
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows class using the specified parameters.

params.name: containsAllRows
params.description: List of picklist items. Indicates if all values of the picklist are included in a type-ahead search query (true) or only those values initially displayed when the list is clicked on (false). A picklist in a Lightning component can display only the first 200 values of a list. If containsAllRows is set to false, when a user does a type-ahead search to find values in the picklist, the search will only look at those first 200 values that were displayed, not the complete set of picklist values.

constructors.name: DynamicPickListRows
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows class using the specified parameter.

constructors.name: DynamicPickListRows
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows class. You can then add rows by using the classâ€™s addRow or addAllRows methods.

methods.name: addAllRows
methods.description: Adds a list of picklist items to a dynamic picklist rendered in a Lightning component on a Lightning page.

methods.name: addRow
methods.description: Adds a single picklist item to a dynamic picklist rendered in a Lightning component on a Lightning page.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows object.

methods.name: containsAllRows
methods.description: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether all values of the picklist are included when a user does a type-ahead search query (true) or only those values initially displayed when the list is clicked on (false).

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns a picklist element stored at the specified index.

methods.name: getDataRows
methods.description: Returns a list of picklist items.

methods.name: setContainsAllRows
methods.description: Sets the value indicating whether all values of the picklist are included when a user does a type-ahead search query (true) or only those values initially displayed when the list is clicked on (false).

params.name: containsAllRows
params.description: Indicates if all values of the picklist are included in a type-ahead search query (true) or only those values initially displayed when the list is clicked on (false). A picklist in a Lightning component can display only the first 200 values of a list. If containsAllRows is set to false, when a user does a type-ahead search to find values in the picklist, the search will only look at those first 200 values that were displayed, not the complete set of picklist values.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the size of the list of VisualEditor.DynamicPickListRows.

description: Contains a list of picklist items in a Lightning component on a Lightning page.
